description: Manage the managed service identity of an ExpressRoute Port.

commands.name: az network express-route port identity assign
commands.summary: Assign a managed service identity to an ExpressRoute Port.
commands.syntax:
az network express-route port identity assign --identity
                                              --name
                                              --resource-group
                                              [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
examples: az network express-route port identity assign --resource-group MyResourceGroup --name MyExpressRoutePort --identity MyUserAssignedManagedServiceIdentity

commands.name: az network express-route port identity remove
commands.summary: Remove the managed service identity of an ExpressRoute Port.
commands.syntax:
az network express-route port identity remove --name
                                              --resource-group
                                              [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
examples: az network express-route port identity remove -g MyResourceGroup --name MyExpressRoutePort

commands.name: az network express-route port identity show
commands.summary: Show the managed service identity of an ExpressRoute Port.
commands.syntax:
az network express-route port identity show --name
                                            --resource-group
examples: az network express-route port identity show -g MyResourceGroup --name MyExpressRoutePort

commands.name: az network express-route port identity wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
commands.syntax:
az network express-route port identity wait [--created]
                                            [--custom]
                                            [--deleted]
                                            [--exists]
                                            [--ids]
                                            [--interval]
                                            [--name]
                                            [--resource-group]
                                            [--subscription]
                                            [--timeout]
                                            [--updated]
